Module org.dellroad.hl7
Package org.dellroad.hl7.llp

Class MSH18CharsetDecoder

java.lang.Object
org.dellroad.hl7.llp.MSH18CharsetDecoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharsetDecoder
public class MSH18CharsetDecoder extends Object implements CharsetDecoder
Attempts to determine HL7 message character encoding by decoding header field MSH.18, if present, or falling back to a configured default as a last resort.

Instances are thread safe.
